## Checklist

<!-- Mark completed items with an "x" -->

### Code Quality

- [ ] My code follows the project's code style and guidelines
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my own code
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings or errors

### Testing

- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or that my feature works
- [ ] New and existing unit tests pass locally with my changes (`npm run test:run`)
- [ ] I have tested my changes in multiple browsers (if applicable)

### Documentation

- [ ] I have updated the documentation accordingly
- [ ] I have updated the README.md (if applicable)
- [ ] I have added/updated JSDoc comments for new functions/components

### Pre-merge

- [ ] I have run `npm run lint` and fixed any issues
- [ ] I have run `npm run build` and it completes successfully
- [ ] My branch is up to date with the base branch
